dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENTS.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL IS NULL THEN 'Unclassfied' ELSE AT_DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENTS.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL END AS SECURITY_CATEGORY_CURRENT_LE31, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('FTR/08', 'LR', '14FTR_ORA', '14FTRHDC_ORA', 'CUR_ORA', 'FTR_HDC_ORA', 'FTR_ORA', 'FTR_SCH15', 'FTRSCH15_ORA', 'HDR_ORA', 'LR_ORA', 'LR_SEC236A', 'LR_SEC91_ORA', 'LR_YOI_ORA', 'FTR_HDC', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_EPP', 'LR_ES', 'LR_HDC', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LASPO_AR', 'LR_LASPO_DR', 'LR_LIFE', 'LR_MLP', 'LR_YOI') THEN 'Recall' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('A_CFINE', 'CIV_RMD', 'CIVIL', 'CIVIL_CON', 'CIVIL_DT', 'YO_CFINE', 'YOC_CONT') THEN 'Civil prisoners' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('EXTRAD', 'RX', 'S35MHA', 'S36MHA', 'S48MHA', 'TRL', 'UNFIT') THEN 'Remand' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('DEPORT', 'DET', 'REC_DEP') THEN 'Detainee' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('SEC43', 'JR', 'S38MHA', 'S41MHA', 'S43MHA', 'S45MHA', 'SEC10_3', 'SEC17_3', 'SEC18_2', 'SEC19_3B', 'SEC2_1', 'SEC24_2A', 'SEC30', 'SEC37', 'SEC38', 'SEC39', 'SEC42', 'SEC45', 'SEC5', 'SEC56', 'SEC6_4', 'SEC6B', 'SEC8_6', 'UNK_CONV') THEN 'Convicted unsentenced' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE IN ('BOAR', 'S37MHA', 'ADIMP_ORA', 'BOTUS', 'CRIM_CON', 'DTO_ORA', 'SEC236A', 'SEC91_03_ORA', 'UNK_CUST', 'YOI_ORA', 'A_FINE', 'A_FINE1', 'A_FINE2', 'AFIXED', 'ALP', 'ALP_LASPO', 'CFLIFE', 'CJCON08', 'CUSTPLUS', 'DFL', 'DLP', 'DPP', 'DTO', 'DTTO', 'EXSENT', 'EXSENT03', 'EXSENT08', 'HMPL', 'INT_CUST', 'IPP', 'LASPO_AR', 'LASPO_DR', 'LIFE', 'MLP', 'S47MHA', 'SEC90', 'SEC90_03', 'SEC91', 'SEC91_03', 'SEC93', 'SEC93_03', 'SEC94', 'SENT', 'SENT_EXL', 'SENT03', 'UNK_SENT', 'YOFINE', 'YOFIXED', (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) THEN 'Sentenced' ELSE 'Other' END AS LEGAL_STATUS_GROUPING, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_NK END AS ALERT_CATEGORY_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENTS, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SECURITY_CATEGORY_CURRENT_LE31, LEGAL_STATUS_GROUPING, IEP_BAND, ALERT_CODE_NK, ALERT_CATEGORY_CODE, ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_STATUS, CASE WHEN SUM(V_VUNERABLE_PRISONER) >= 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END AS V_VUN_FINAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_CAT_A_
field.legacySql: =If([Security Category - Current Level]) InList ("Cat A"; "Cat A Hi"; "Prov A") Then "A" Else ""

errors.error: dataset::injectCalculations unable to append column : V_CAT_A_ :: Error: argument 'sql': 'NoneType' object cannot be converted to 'PyString'
Report field V_CAT_A_ does not have corresponding dataset schema field
Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
